alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 2:56AM AKST until February 06 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over Elliot Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow will make travel difficult. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions will be early this morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
